items.content_html: use-next-sse is a lightweight and easy-to-use React hook library for implementing Server-Sent Events (SSE) in Next.js applications, enabling real-time, unidirectional data streaming from server to client.

items.content_html: FatwaBot is an Arabic conversational AI built with FastText NLP, Express.js, MySQL, and JWT. It provides accurate, culturally relevant responses to Islamic queries, supporting MSA and dialects. Featuring secure user authentication and a React-based UI, it offers a lightweight and scalable chatbot solution.
items.title: Abdullah-Baqais/FatwaBot: FatwaBot is an Arabic conversational AI built with FastText NLP, Express.js, MySQL, and JWT. It provides accurate, culturally relevant responses to Islamic queries, supporting MSA and dialects. Featuring secure user authentication and a React-based UI, it offers a lightweight and scalable chatbot solution.
